alert.note: Alert for Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 11:04PM CDT until July 21 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Smith County in central Mississippi... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1104 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Raleigh, or 18 miles northeast of Magee, moving southwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Raleigh around 1110 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
